Package com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.Weapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicProjectileSpawner, RandomDirProjectileSpawner, SpokeProjectileSpawner
    public abstract class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected double fireDelay
      The amount of time required where the weapon can not attack, to match the fire rate per second
      protected Projectiles projectileType
      The projectile type that the weapon will spawn
      protected long startTime
      The last time the weapon called fired (called the attack method)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Weapon​(double fireRatePerSecond, Projectiles projectileType)
      Instantiates variables, sets the projectiles to be sensors and calculates the fire delay

      • Weapon

        public Weapon​(double fireRatePerSecond,
              Projectiles projectileType)
        Instantiates variables, sets the projectiles to be sensors and calculates the fire delay
        Parameters:
        fireRatePerSecond - The number of attack calls per second
        projectileType - The projectile type to be spawned

    • Method Detail

      • spawnProjectile

        protected void spawnProjectile​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnPos,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 projectileVel)
        Method for creating a projectiles body, fixture and sprite before g iving it a velocity appropriate for the projectiles speed and storing its initial spawn point.
        Parameters:
        spawnPos - The position in meters where the projectiles are being spawned from
        projectileVel - The velocity of th projectileVel being the direction vector between the spawn pos and target

      • setLinearVelocity

        protected void setLinearVelocity​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 vel)
        Sets the current projectiles velocity
        Parameters:
        vel - The velocity the projectile will be given

      • getTargetDir

        protected com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getTargetDir​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnPoint,
                                                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 targetPos)
        A method for getting the direction as a vector from the spawn point to the target position
        Parameters:
        spawnPoint - The location the projectiles are being spawned from in meters
        targetPos - The location of the target in meters
        Returns:
        The direction vector from the projectile spawn point to the target pos

      • canFire

        protected boolean canFire()
        Tells us whether enough time has passed for the Weapon to fire again
        Returns:
        true if the weapon can fire, false if the weapon can not fire

      • attack

        public abstract void attack​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnPos,
                            com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 target)
        All projectile spawners must have an attack method
        Parameters:
        spawnPos - The spawn point for the projectiles
        target - The target the projectiles will travel to

      • setFixtureCategory

        public void setFixtureCategory​(short catBits,
                               short maskBits)
        A method for setting all future Box2D fixture creations to have the passed in collision filtering
        Parameters:
        catBits - The category bits used for Box2D collision filtering
        maskBits - The mask bits used for Box2D collision filtering
